74 suicide warnings and 243 mentions of hanging: What ChatGPT said to a suicidal teenThe Washington Post12/27/2025

Analysis of high-schooler Adam Raine’s ChatGPT account by attorneys for his parents shows how the chatbot became a confidant as he planned to end his life.

Artificial IntelligenceRead

          if (Math.random() <= 1 && 'ReportingObserver' in window) {
            const observer = new ReportingObserver((reports) => {
              reports.forEach((report) => {
                window.perfDataLayer = window.perfDataLayer || [];

                const event = {
                  sourcetype: "httpevent",
                  time: Math.floor(Date.now() / 1000),
                  source: "site-prod-logs",
                  index: "site-eng",
                  event: {
                    name: "performanceTracking", 
                    host: window.location.hostname,
                    url: window.location.href,
                    app: "spectrum",
                    report: report.toJSON(),
                  }
                };
                window.perfDataLayer.push(event);
              });
            }, { types: ['crash', 'intervention', 'deprecation'], buffered: true });
            observer.observe();

            window.addEventListener("beforeunload", () => {
              observer.disconnect();
            });
          }

      const applyTheme = () => {
        const storedTheme = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("GetroSetro"))?.["prefers-color-scheme"]?.value;
        const prefersDark = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches;

        if (storedTheme === "dark" || (storedTheme === "system" && prefersDark) || (!storedTheme && prefersDark)) {
          document.documentElement.classList.add("wpds-dark");
        } else {
          document.documentElement.classList.remove("wpds-dark");
        }
      };

      // Apply theme on load
      applyTheme();

      // Listen for changes in localStorage
      window.addEventListener("storage", (e) => {
        if (e.key === "GetroSetro") {
          applyTheme();
        }
      });

      // Add event listener for system theme changes
      window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").addEventListener("change", (e) => {
        const storedTheme = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("GetroSetro"))?.["prefers-color-scheme"]?.value;
        if (!storedTheme || storedTheme === "system") {
          document.documentElement.classList.toggle("wpds-dark", e.matches);
        }
      });
    } catch (e) {
      window.perfDataLayer = window.perfDataLayer || [];
      window.perfDataLayer.push({ event: "theme_error", error: e.message });

readabilityObject.title: 74 suicide warnings and 243 mentions of hanging: What ChatGPT said to a suicidal teen
readabilityObject.content:
Democracy Dies in Darkness

Analysis of high-schooler Adam Raine’s ChatGPT account by attorneys for his parents shows how the chatbot became a confidant as he planned to end his life.

December 27, 2025

Help Nitasha Tiku report on mental health and AI by contacting her securely on Signal at nitasha.10.

Adam Raine’s life hurtled toward tragedy soon after he began talking with ChatGPT about homework last fall.

Their exchanges grew more consuming as the 16-year-old opened up to the chatbot about his suicidal thoughts, according to data analysis of the conversations shared with The Washington Post by attorneys for Adam’s parents.
